Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Wynn Las Vegas in Las Vegas (The Strip), you'll be minutes from Fashion Show Mall and close to Las Vegas Convention Center. This 5-star resort is within close proximity of Sands Expo Convention Center and The Auto Collections.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and flat-screen televisions. Your room comes with a pillowtop bed. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with separate bathtubs and showers feature designer toiletries and hair dryers.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Pamper yourself with a visit to the spa, which offers massages, body treatments, and facials. While the golfer in the family is out on the course, you can enjoy above-par recreational amenities such as a casino and a nightclub. This resort also features complimentary wireless Internet access, gift shops/newsstands, and a hair salon.

Dining
Grab a bite to eat at one of the resort's dining establishments, which include 14 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. Relax with a refreshing drink from a poolside bar or one of the 6 bars/lounges.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, limo/town car service, and express check-in. Free valet parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM
Grab a bite to eat at one of the resort's dining establishments, which include 14 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. Relax with a refreshing drink from a poolside bar or one of the 6 bars/lounges.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • The name on the credit card used at check-in to pay for incidentals must be the primary name on the guestroom reservation.

With a stay at Wynn Las Vegas in Las Vegas (The Strip), you'll be minutes from Fashion Show Mall and close to Las Vegas Convention Center. This 5-star resort is within close proximity of Sands Expo Convention Center and The Auto Collections.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Fashion Show Mall - 0 km / 0 mi
Sands Expo Convention Center - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
The Auto Collections - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
High Roller - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
The Linq - 1.2 km / 0.8 mi
Las Vegas Convention Center - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
Las Vegas Country Club - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
Crystals at City Center - 2.2 km / 1.3 mi
National Atomic Testing Museum - 2.3 km / 1.4 mi
Desert Research Institute - 2.3 km / 1.4 mi
Boulevard Mall - 2.8 km / 1.7 mi
University of Nevada-Las Vegas - 3.2 km / 2 mi
Clark County Library - 3.3 km / 2 mi
Marjorie Barrick Museum - 3.3 km / 2 mi
Thomas and Mack Center - 3.3 km / 2.1 mi

The preferred airport for Wynn Las Vegas is Las Vegas, NV (LAS-McCarran Intl.) - 4.9 km / 3.1 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Wynn Las Vegas is Las Vegas, NV (LAS-McCarran Intl.) - 5.1 km / 3.1 mi.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property’s location to the point of interest or airport and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometre.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Message.Text:
RESORT FEE 45$+13.38%TAX PER NIGHT HAS TO BE PAID DIRECTLY BY GUEST ON SPOT// RESORT FEE $45+13.38%TASAS NO ESTAN INCLUIDAS EN LAS TARIFAS Y SE DEBERAN PAGAR DIRECTAMENTE EN EL ALOJAMIENTO.

*** MAJORITY OF AGE AT THIS HOTEL IS 21 YEARS-OLD // LA MAYORIA DE EDAD EN ESTE HOTEL ES 21 A¥OS *** *** GUESTS UNDER 21 YEARS OLD WON'T BE ALLOWED TO CHECK-IN UNLESS THEY ARE ACCOMPANIED BY SOMEONE WITH 21 YEARS OLD OR OLDER // LOS CLIENTES CON MENOS DE 21 A¥OS NO PODRAN INGRESAR EN EL HOTEL SIN ESTAR ACOMPA¥ADOS POR UN ADULTO DE 21 A¥OS O MAS ***

SWIMMING POOL TIMETABLES FROM 8th MARCH: WYNN: TOWER SUITES POOL (8.00am-5.00pm) RESORT POOL(8.00am-5.00pm) EUROPEAN POOL(8.00am-5.00pm) JACUZZI (8.00am-5.00pm)

THERE'S NO POSSIBLE TO DO ANY MODIFICATION ON THE DATES//NO ES POSIBLE MODIFICAR NINGUNA FECHA DE LAS RESERVAS

*** IMPORTANT INFORMATION: FOR THOSE RESERVATIONS WITH MORE THAN 1 ROOM BOOKEDTHE TITULAR OF THE RESERVATION MUST DO THE CHECK-IN FOR ALL THE ROOMS AND THE HOTEL WON'T AUTHORISE ANY NAME CHANGES // *** INFORMACION IMPORTANTE: PARA AQUELLAS RESERVAS QUE INCLUYAN MAS DE UNA HABITACION, EL TITULAR DE LA RESERVADEBERA EFECTUAR EL CHECK-IN DE TODAS LAS HABITACIONES Y EL HOTEL NO PERMITIRA CAMBIOS DE NOMBRE.

Important notices: In case of any amendment please contact us to check the rates and conditions as these could change - Hotel will invoice the total amount of this booking in case of no show / En caso de modificacion, por favor contacten con nosotros para verificar las tarifas y condiciones de la reserva ya que podrian ser diferentes - En caso de no show el hotel se reserva el derecho de aplicar gastos del 100%
